## SignalsSvc type

The type of the signals service returned by `createSignals()`<!-- -->.

Contains all signal primitives: `signal`<!-- -->, `computed`<!-- -->, `effect`<!-- -->, `batch`<!-- -->, `subscribe`<!-- -->, plus a `dispose()` method for cleanup.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SignalsSvc = Svc<DefaultExtensions>;
```

**References:** [Svc](../../lattice/svc/)<!-- -->, [DefaultExtensions](../defaultextensions/)

## Example

Type annotation

```ts
import { createSignals, type SignalsSvc } from '@lattice/signals/presets/core';

function initApp(svc: SignalsSvc) {
  const count = svc.signal(0);
  // ...
}

const svc = createSignals();
initApp(svc);
```
